BuildingInfo.Help: Build a Noble District in your Capital to receive a Grand Menagerie for free.

[ICON_BULLET]A City with a Merchant District increases the chance to discover new land Resources by 20% in your whole Empire! Build a Merchant District in your Capital to receive a Bazaar of Mammon for free.

BuildingInfo.Civilopedia: The Guild of Fighters is an Organization that aims to perfect physical combat technics.
